alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 11:18PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WESTERN DELAWARE AND NORTHERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 1145 PM EDT... At 1117 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Richwood, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Delaware, Powell, Richwood, Ashley, Radnor, Ostrander, Magnetic Springs, Raymond, Delaware State Park, Stratford, Byhalia, Bellepoint, Broadway, Warrensburg, Pharisburg, Kilbourne, Essex and State Route 257 at US Route 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
